body: This just reminds me of my crippling loneliness
This artist is Moonlight! And he teaches us [MEN] how to make love! We cannot keep a penis erected as long as in porn but everything is possible. This is one of the really few sex lessons from porn.
Even though they haven't been around that long, I really like this artist. Their style somewhat reminds me of Kon-kit.
still waiting for part 1 and 5 to be translated.
